thread.title: ISIS second in command killed in US air strike
thread.title_full: ISIS second in command killed in US air strike | News24

author: news24.com
title: ISIS second in command killed in US air strike
text:
Beirut - The Islamic State has confirmed in an audio recording that the group's second in command was killed in a US air strike earlier this year.
"Americans were overjoyed with the killing of Abu Mutaz al Qurashi and thought it was a victory ... we tell them he did not die. He has left heroes to fight the Americans and their allies," spokesperson Abu Mohamed al-Adnani said in an audio recording posted on the ISIS-affiliated website al-Furqan.
The US announced on August 21 that Qurashi, also known as Fadhil Ahmad al-Hayali, was killed on August 18 in a US air strike near the northern Iraqi city of Mosul.
Al Adnani did not say when or where al Qurashi was killed.
